results.title: Simvastatin suppresses cyclophosphamide-induced changes in urodynamics and bladder inflammation.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To assess the ability of daily oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration to reduce the negative urodynamic changes associated with @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@cyclophosphamide@@@ (CP)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cystitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003556 @@@cystitis@@@ and to prevent @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@bladder inflammation@@@.

citations.NLM: Hughes FM Jr, McKeithan P, Ellett J, Armeson KE, Purves JT. Simvastatin suppresses cyclophosphamide-induced changes in urodynamics and bladder inflammation. Urology. 2013 Jan;81(1):209.e9-14. PMID: 23153940
